ModMetaData.name: [RH] Faction: Last Man Contingent
ModMetaData.author: Chicken Plucker
ModMetaData.description:
Formerly known as "Last Man Mercs", a disgraced Private Military Company allegedly connected a growing list of notorious crimes. Drugs, guns, money and slaves. An organization that offers the entire world for your soul.
Credits to: Ods and BajtMe - For help with awesome apparel textures Jecrell, Jdalt40, dninemfive and Spdskatr - For C# coding assistance and patches Uros - T-55 model Ducky - For inspiring this mod Andy McKee - Africa acoustic cover
